title: Undergrads in dual-degree program to study two years in France (University of California - Berkeley) ...
text: ( Source : University of California - Berkeley ) A new dual-degree program will be offered in fall 2016 by UC Berkeley 's College of Letters and Science . But this program has a twist. Freshmen applying to Berkeley will also have the opportunity
